1. "Jumper" - This film revolves around a young man with teleportation abilities who finds himself caught up in an ancient war between people like him. The movie features stars like Hayden Christensen and Kristen Stewart.

2. "The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones" - This is a fantasy-action film where the protagonist discovers she's part of a lineage of warriors protecting our world from demons. It might appeal to you if you enjoyed the biblical themes in "The Passion of the Christ". The movie stars Kevin Zegers and Aidan Turner.
